summary:
This mod adds a bunch of books (encyclopedia) around a new desk in the Winterhold College.
Infos: Vanilla, Hearthfire, Dawnguard
Dragonborn: not yet
descriptionHtml:
This plug-in adds a Encyclopedia to the game. 
It can be found in ten volumes on the Studying Desk this mod adds in front of the College\'s Library. 

I mainly exported raw knowledge from websites as I would forget bunch of things if I would have written it myself. 
Enjoy your reading ! 

The ten books have each their subject and some got illustrations in it. 
For further informations, I added Vanilla Books near the place so you can read them :D. 

[UPDATE] --- 1 
I fixed the pictures. However, if you encounter difficulties, contact me, I may have missed some mistakes. 
I fixed the apparent code lines. As for the pics, it\'s possible there are still few I missed. 
I added a treasure map and a chest, with a new item inside. Enjoy the hunt. 

[UPDATE] --- 2 
I fixed some more apparent code lines. 
I fixed some more pictures. 
As some of you requested, I added a book and a note about console commands and IDs 
I added a table in the corner so other books won\'t fall on the floor. 

[UPDATE] --- 3 
ADDED HEARTHFIRE ! THAT\'S RIGHT BRO ! 

[UPDATE] --- 4 
ADDED DAWNGUARD !! \\o/ 
Fixed the ownership bug about the Hearthfire book. 
Renamed \"Groups\" after \"Faction\" as suggested. 


TO DO: 

- Exterminate all the apparent code lines and other erros with pictures. 
- Fix whatever that needs to be fixed. 
- Make a Dragonborn extension. 
- Add MOAR pictures.
author: 357Magnum
